PaymentMandate.name: PaymentMandate
PaymentMandate.description: Represents information about the payment mandates given by a customer to their bank or financial institution to authorize a third party to collect payments from their account.

AuthorizationType.description: The type of authorization associated with the mandate. For example, whether the authorization is for the payment or disbursement requested in the mandate.

BankAccountNumber.description: The account number of the bank that's used for the payment or disbursement.

BankBranchAddress.description: The address of the bank's branch that's selected for repayment.

BankBranchName.description: The name of the bank that's selected for repayment.

BankName.description: The name of the bank that's selected for repayment.

BankRoutingNumber.description: The sort code or routing number of the bank that's used for payment or disbursement.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies are enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

DisbursementAddress.description: The address where the disbursement check is sent.

DisbursementCity.description: The city related to the disbursement address.

DisbursementCountry.description: The country related to the disbursement address.

DisbursementGeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the milestone location’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

DisbursementLatitude.description: The latitude related to the disbursement address.

DisbursementLongitude.description: The longitude related to the disbursement address.

DisbursementPostalCode.description: The postal code related to the disbursement address.

DisbursementState.description: The state related to the disbursement address.

DisbursementStreet.description: The street related to the disbursement address.

FinancialAccountId.description: The financial account associated with the payment mandate.

IsAccountValidated.description: Indicates whether the account is validated (true) or not (false).

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the mandate is active (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

MandateAmount.description: The amount of the payment or disbursement requested in the mandate.

MandateEffectiveDate.description: The start date of the mandate.

MandateEndDate.description: The end date of the mandate.

MandateExternalIdentifier.description: The external registration identifier of the mandate.

MandateFrequency.description: The payment frequency for the mandate.

MandateInternalIdentifier.description: The unique ID of the mandate.

MandateSubmissionDate.description: The date when the mandate was submitted.

Name.description: The name of the payment mandate.

OwnerId.description: The owner of the payment mandate record.

PersonAccountId.description: The person account that's associated with the mandate.

Ratio.description: The disbursement or payment percentage across bank accounts.
